text: Jilani: “Ana mu akwawanganya ŵenu (ni Allah) pana jwaakongolelaga ku yakuona?” Jilani: “Allah ni jwaakongolelaga ku yakuona. Ana jwaakongolela ku yakuona ngaŵa nijwali jwakuŵajilwa kunkuya, kapena ajula jwangaŵa nkulipatila chongoko niikaŵeje akajongoledwe? Ana chipali chichi kukwenu? Nkulamula chinauli?”
